**Today we've started celebrating "[Yule](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yule)" and since we want to share our joy with you we've prepared new promo offer**

**For regular users**
Move your domains to Rage4 DNS between 21st of December 2012 and 1st of January 2013 and get additional 150k request of free usage per domain (400k total instead of 250k in regular offer)

**For service providers**
Become Rage4 Partner between 21st of December 2012 and 1st of January 2013 and get 
- additional 50 domains if you choose monthly flat fee (50EUR/month per each 300 domains [250 domains in regular offer]) without any request limits,
- additional 250 domains if you choose yearly flat fee (600EUR/year per each 500 domains [250 domains in regular offer]) without any request limits


**Rage4 DNS offers you**
- fast, dual stack anycast network,
- amazing support,
- free GeoDNS,
- free failover (with support for [UptimeRobot](http://www.uptimerobot.com/), [NewRelic](http://newrelic.com/), [ScaleXtreme](http://www.scalextreme.com/) and generic webhooks),
- API access,
- service trusted by such providers like Prometeus, Castlegem or Fliphost

**Joins us at [Rage4 DNS](http://rage4.com)**

Note: regular users promo available only for domains first time added to our system
